translation.en: Mm, those acorns look so yummy!
translation.de: Diese Eicheln sehen so lecker aus!

translation.en: ♪ We're on a mission, let's explore ♪
translation.de: Wir sind Entdecker, auf großer Mission

translation.en: ♪ Let's have some fun and so much more ♪
translation.de: Wir haben viel Spaß, wie neulich schon

translation.en: ♪ Travel the world and meet new friends ♪
translation.de: Treffen neue Freunde, entdecken die Welt

translation.en: -♪ Our journey never ends ♪ -♪ Let's go! ♪
Hey, is that a bag full of acorns?
translation.de: Hey, ist das ein ganzer Sack voller Eicheln?

translation.en: You're not going to eat all of them, are you?
translation.de: Du wirst sie nicht alle essen, oder?

translation.en: I'm going to take them home.
Anyway, there are still a lot more acorns under the big tree.
translation.de: Es sind noch viel mehr Eicheln unter dem großen Baum.

translation.en: With the other acorns under the tree.
Duh, I should really go pick them up.
But you have so many already.
translation.de: Aber du hast doch schon so viele.

translation.en: Chewoo, those acorns will have to wait.
It seems that a pika living in China is in trouble!
translation.de: Es scheint, ein Pfeifhase in China ist in Not!

translation.en: Hi! You're YooHoo and the crew, right?
What are those in your basket?
But, Tokee, you called us for help, right?
translation.de: Tokee, du riefst uns um Hilfe, oder?

translation.en: Well, how can we help you?
Well, I guess we should go to my home first.
translation.de: Also, gehen wir erst zur mir.

translation.en: Since I'm the only pika living in this forest,
translation.de: Ich bin der einzige Pfeifhase hier,

translation.en: no one has ever really come to my house.
translation.de: also hatte ich noch nie Besuch.

translation.en: Actually, that's why I called you.
It's so crowded here, so I need to move to a bigger place.
translation.de: Es ist so eng, ich muss in ein größeres umziehen.

translation.en: But I have too much stuff.
I can't carry everything on my own.
Oh, please be careful and don't step on the cones.
I got these pine cones myself!
translation.de: Ich habe die Zapfen selbst gesammelt!

translation.en: Yeah! Nobody in this forest has this many pine cones!
translation.de: Ja! Niemand in diesem Wald hat so viele Tannenzapfen!

translation.en: Why did you bring all these other pine cones, then?
translation.de: Warum hast du noch mehr mitgebracht?

translation.en: the cones are different colors and shapes.
But I barely touched the pine cones.
translation.de: Ich habe die Zapfen kaum berührt.

translation.en: It's just that there were way too many pine cones on the pile.
translation.de: Es waren nur viel zu viele Tannenzapfen auf dem Stapel.

translation.en: You just need a bigger place for them, Tokee.
translation.de: Du brauchst nur ein größeres Haus.

translation.en: That's why I called you guys here.
I need to move to a bigger house.
All right, then. We'll help you, Tokee.
translation.de: Na schön. Wir helfen dir, Tokee.

translation.en: Phew! I almost forgot to bring this one.
We have more pine cones now.
translation.de: Wir haben jetzt noch mehr Tannenzapfen.

translation.en: It's because Tokee picked up even more pine cones on the way here.
translation.de: Weil Tokee unterwegs noch mehr Tannenzapfen sammelte.

translation.en: This new place is not going to cut it.
Should I move to a new bigger place? Again?
translation.de: Soll ich in ein noch größeres ziehen?

translation.en: No matter where you go, Tokee,
your house will feel small if you keep collecting pine cones.
translation.de: wird es sich klein anfühlen, wenn du weiter sammelst.

translation.en: What if we throw some away?
Tokee, do you really need all these pine cones?
translation.de: Tokee, brauchst du wirklich alle diese Zapfen?

translation.en: Well, I don't exactly, absolutely, totally need them.
translation.de: Na ja, ich brauche sie nicht absolut unbedingt.

translation.en: So, what do you want to do with them?
translation.de: Also, was willst du damit machen?

translation.en: Well, I don't really do anything with them.
translation.de: Also, ich mache eigentlich nichts damit.

translation.en: And I happen to know that pine cones are not edible.
translation.de: Und ich weiß, Tannenzapfen sind nicht essbar.

translation.en: She likes to stare at them.
And she likes to play with them.
Yeah, play with them, you know?
How would you play with pine cones?
I would play with them with friends.
There should be another pika living at the end of this road.
translation.de: Am Ende der Straße müsste noch ein Pfeifhase wohnen.

translation.en: I bet it would be much more fun to share pine cones with friends.
translation.de: Es würde mehr Spaß machen, die Zapfen mit Freunden zu teilen.

translation.en: I'm YooHoo and this is my crew.
Our pika friend just moved close to here.
Her name is Tokee and she lives at the end of that road.
translation.de: Sie heißt Tokee und wohnt am Ende der Straße.

translation.en: And she would love to invite you to her new house.
translation.de: Und sie lädt dich in ihr neues Haus ein.

translation.en: Would you like to join us for dinner?
I've never had a friend come over to my house.
translation.de: Ich hatte noch nie Freunde zu Besuch.

translation.en: As long as you're kind to him, I guess.
translation.de: Solange du freundlich zu ihm bist.

translation.en: Uh... How do I do that?
Um, you greet him, ask him to sit, offer him something to eat?
translation.de: Ihn grüßen, ihm einen Sitzplatz und etwas zu essen anbieten?

translation.en: Should we throw some pine cones away?
That's how you show you're a kind friend, right?
That sounds exactly like something a kind friend would do.
translation.de: Genau so würde sich ein lieber Freund verhalten.

translation.en: Make room for a new friend!
Oh-oh. It's so cool in here.

translation.de: Echt? Danke, dass du das sagst.

translation.en: Did you set all these pine cones up?
translation.de: Hast du all diese Zapfen aufgestellt?
Das habe ich noch nie gesehen...

translation.en: Thanks for inviting me over, Tokee.
So, can I visit you again some time?
translation.de: Kann ich dich mal wieder besuchen?

translation.en: Hey, here. This is for you.
But you said this one is really special to you.
translation.de: Aber du sagtest, der wäre ganz besonders für dich.

translation.en: I used to think only pine cones were special
translation.de: Ich hielt nur Zapfen für besonders,

translation.en: back when I didn't have any friends.
But now, I don't think that.
but not as special as you are.
translation.de: aber nicht so, wie du es bist.

translation.en: Yeah, she won't have to move again.
translation.de: Ja, sie muss nicht wieder umziehen.

translation.en: What would my dear friend Chewoo do with all her acorns?
translation.de: Was tut meine liebe Freundin Chewoo mit all ihren Eicheln?

translation.en: I'm not going to bring all the acorns home.
translation.de: Ich bringe sie nicht alle heim.
-Ja, kehren wir heim! -Ja, kehren wir heim!

translation.en: They are also known as crying rabbits
translation.de: Sie heißen wegen der Töne so,

translation.en: because of the sound they make.
[YooHoo] These animals have small ears and short tails,
translation.de: Sie haben kleine Ohren und eine kurzen Schwanz

translation.en: and store food in caves or between rocks.
translation.de: und lagern Nahrung in Höhlen aus Steinen.

translation.en: Now, the cute pikas are our friends, too!
translation.de: Jetzt sind Pfeifhasen auch unsere Freunde!
